Body:
fbt = FeatureBinarizerFromTrees(treeNum=1, treeDepth=3, returnOrd=True,
    colCateg=self.col_categorical, randomState=self.random_state)
fbt.fit(self.X_train[['mean area', 'mean concave points', 'cat num',
    'cat alpha']], self.y_train)
self.assertListEqual(fbt.ordinal, ['mean area', 'mean concave points'])
self.assertTrue(type(fbt.scaler) is StandardScaler)
self.assertTrue(fbt.scaler.transform(self.X_test[fbt.ordinal]).shape[1] == 2)
